costs.title: Cost of Living Comparison
costs.disclaimer: Costs indexed relative to NYC (100). Lower = cheaper.

timezone.title: Time Difference
timezone.tipAhead: When it's morning in {origin}, it's already afternoon/evening in {destination}.
timezone.tipBehind: When it's morning in {origin}, it's still night/early morning in {destination}.

briefing.title: Audio Briefings
briefing.noCorridor: Please select a migration corridor to receive personalized briefings.
briefing.noBriefing: No briefing available yet. Generate your first audio briefing to get started.
briefing.generatingAudio: Converting your briefing to audio. This may take a moment...
briefing.audioFailed: Audio generation failed. Please try again.

chat.title: Ask TRIBE
chat.welcome: Hi! I'm your migration assistant. Ask me anything about moving abroad, visas, housing, or settling into a new country.
chat.welcomeWithCorridor: Hi! I'm your migration assistant. Ask me anything about your journey from {origin} to {destination}.
chat.placeholder: Ask about visas, costs, housing, culture...
chat.noCorridorDescription: Please complete your onboarding to select a migration corridor before using the chat.
chat.confirmClear: Are you sure you want to clear your chat history? This cannot be undone.
chat.error: Sorry, something went wrong. Please try again.
chat.rateLimited: You've reached the limit for real-time searches. Try again in an hour.
chat.perplexityNote: This answer includes real-time information that may be more current than our cached knowledge.

sources.title: Sources
